attributes.action: Push for prosecution of any MP found to have acted in an immoral or fraudulent manner
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Given the number of "right honourable" MPs who have abused the public purse and the trust of their constituents it seems a deterrent from future abuse would be to ask the police to prosecute those that acted in either an immoral or fraudulent manner. This might help to rebuild the severe lack of confidence in the House of Commons.

rejection.details: The PM cannot instruct the police and CPS in this way. Anyone can refer a matter to the police for investigation and they have the discretion whether to investigate the matter or not.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
